trans-unit.source: Description of modifications done to entities by operations returned in a <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 描述对所做修改实体由操作中返回<xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> object that contains a series of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse> objects each of which contains a sequence of EntityDescriptor or <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor> instances that represent changes that were persisted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>对象，其中包含一系列<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse>其中每个包含 EntityDescriptor 序列的对象或<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor>表示是否已持久保存的更改的实例。</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: For successful operations, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A> property of the descriptor will be set to unchanged and the new values for insert and update operations will be merged according to the merge settings.
trans-unit.target: 对于成功的操作，<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>的描述符的属性将设置为保持不变，而新值来进行插入和更新操作将根据合并设置进行合并。</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: For operations with errors, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A> of the descriptor will remain the same as it was before <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> was called.
trans-unit.target: 对于出现错误，操作<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>的描述符将保持不变之前<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>曾。</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an error occurred and processing stopped during an operation, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A> will remain unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果出现错误，操作期间，停止处理<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>将保持不变。</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI that modifies the entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于修改实体的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The edit link URI for the entity resource.
trans-unit.target: 实体资源编辑链接 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI that modifies the binary property data of the entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于修改实体二进制属性数据的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The EditStreamUri property contains the edit-media link URI for the Media Resource that is associated with the entity, which is a Media Link Entry.
trans-unit.target: EditStreamUri 属性包含与作为媒体链接入口的实体相关联的媒体资源的编辑媒体链接 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets the entity that contains the update data.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含更新数据的实体。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains update data.
trans-unit.target: 包含更新数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets an eTag value that indicates the state of data targeted for update since the last call to <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取 eTag 值，该值指示自上次调用<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges*>.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges*>以来预期要更新的数据的状态

trans-unit.source: The eTag associated with the entity is used to represent original values for use with optimistic concurrency checks according to eTag rules in HTTP [RFC 2616](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=114956).
trans-unit.target: 与实体关联的 eTag 用于表示原始值，用于根据 HTTP 中的 eTag 规则的开放式并发检查[RFC 2616](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=114956)。

trans-unit.source: The value may be empty or null.
trans-unit.target: 值可能为空或 null。

trans-unit.source: Null represents the case in which no eTag is currently associated with the entity.
trans-unit.target: Null 表示没有 eTag 与实体当前关联的情况。

trans-unit.source: A string value that indicates the state of data.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串值，指示数据的状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI that is the identity value of the entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标识值的实体的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The Identity property corresponds to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_identity" name="identity" href=""></xref> element of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_entry" name="entry" href=""></xref> that represents the entity in the Atom response.
trans-unit.target: 标识属性对应于<xref uid="langword_csharp_identity" name="identity" href=""></xref>元素<xref uid="langword_csharp_entry" name="entry" href=""></xref>表示 Atom 响应中的实体。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent entity that is related to the entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取与实体相关的父实体。

trans-unit.source: An object that is the parent entity in the relationship link.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它在关系链接中的父实体。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the property of the entity that is a navigation property and links to the parent entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取属于导航属性并链接到父实体的实体属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parent property.
trans-unit.target: 父属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI that accesses the binary property data of the entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于访问实体二进制属性数据 URI。

trans-unit.source: The ReadStreamUri property contains the URI for the Media Resource that is associated with the entity, which is a Media Link Entry.
trans-unit.target: ReadStreamUri 属性包含与作为媒体链接入口的实体相关联的媒体资源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: A URI that accesses the binary property as a stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，访问以流的形式的二进制属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI that is used to return the entity resource.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于返回实体资源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: A URI that returns the entity.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，返回该实体。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the type in the data source to which the entity is mapped.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置实体所映射到的数据源中的类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that is the name of the data type.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，它的数据类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the eTag for the media resource associated with an entity that is a media link entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取与作为媒体链接入口的实体关联的媒体资源的 eTag。

trans-unit.source: The StreamETag property returns an eTag value that indicates the state of the Media Resource targeted for update since the last call to <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> when the entity is a media link entry.
trans-unit.target: StreamETag 属性返回一个 eTag 值，该值指示自上次调用以来预期要更新的媒体资源的状态<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>该实体是媒体链接入口。</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The eTag associated with the media resource is used to represent original values for use with optimistic concurrency checks according to eTag rules in HTTP [RFC 2616](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=114956).
trans-unit.target: 与媒体资源的 eTag 用于表示原始值，用于根据 HTTP 中的 eTag 规则的开放式并发检查[RFC 2616](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=114956)。

trans-unit.source: The value may be empty or null.
trans-unit.target: 值可能为空或 null。

trans-unit.source: Null represents the case in which no eTag is currently associated with the Media Resource.
trans-unit.target: Null 表示没有 eTag 与媒体资源当前关联的情况。

trans-unit.source: A string value that indicates the state of data.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串值，指示数据的状态。
